name: Corruption Orchard
content:
Corruption Orchard

A twisted grove where corruption has taken root in the form of malevolent trees. Primary Objectives are corruption nodes. Secondary markers are essence wells or corrupted monuments. The air is thick with the scent of decay and the whispers of lost souls.


Terrain Features:

  • Corruption nodes
  • Essence wells
  • Corrupted monuments
  • Twisted trees

Atmosphere:

The air is filled with the rustling of corrupted leaves and the whispers of lost souls. The ground is littered with fallen fruit that pulses with malevolent energy.
